text: "Funeral for a Friend/Love Lies Bleeding" is a 1973 song by Elton John and is the opening track to his seventh studio album Goodbye Yellow Brick Road. The first part is an instrumental part and segueing intro Love Lies Bleeding. == References == Category:1973 songs Category:Elton John songs Category:Dream Theater songs Category:"Weird Al" Yankovic songs Category:Progressive rock songs
title: Funeral for a Friend/Love Lies Bleeding
